post.body: @dblacombe I'm downloading New Rose Hotel. 1 of Gibson's best short stories. Movie stars C. Walken, W. Dafoe, and Asia Argento
haha just saw your tweet about UFC love- @hamishknox is into it, as are @mariasophia and @michaelallison
I'll wager a beer on that.
No - Rashad will take him down for sure.
Let the Right One In is definitely awesome - I saw it without knowing anything about it except the title.
Loved your post about Sci-fi/culture - thanks for the holiday reading!
well, if the wifi here crashes I've still got 2 seasons of Always Sunny In Philadelphia and the book On The Road to get me by.
Thanks!
Yes, but my flight is only delayed by 2 hours, which isn't that bad.
Fortunately it gave me a chance to catch up with a good friend...and the airport has free Wi-fi!
With what?
Whoa....they're making Neuromancer AND Pattern Recognition into movies?
Honolua was a bit of a let down this morning...just some little, pitching ones. Then it rained, turning the cliff path into a red waterfall.
anyone else besides @flackadelic and myself stoked for UFC 92 tonight?
Why can't I find the second season of Battlestar Galatica on any torrent sites?
At least it was a white christmas here...white with snow on Haleakala and wind-chop, foamy waves. And cold rain.
rain stopped, sun still rising and omaui says 3-5 foot on the north side....boxing day is looking up!
Egad....precious wifi starting to eat shit as more and more delayed passengers boot up their laptops.
the buoys are looking a bit better....and I'm liking the wetsand report http://is.gd/dszs
Who else thought it might have been more trouble than it was worth to upgrade to WP 2.7?
